patthana15.7:4.1: Hetuṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.7:5.1: Hetuṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.7:6.1: Hetuṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
